description: This file defines the AttributesSetReportingRequest class, which extends DeviceRequest and handles setting reporting configurations for a specific cluster on a Zigbee device endpoint within a mock Zigbee device simulation framework. The class includes fields for endpoint ID, cluster ID, mfgSpecific flag, and configuration list, and it defines an executeDeviceRequest method to apply the reporting configs to the specified cluster.

classes.name: AttributesSetReportingRequest
classes.description: Handles setting attribute reporting configurations on a specific device cluster within the mock Zigbee framework.

methods.name: AttributesSetReportingRequest
methods.description: Constructor to initialize the request with parameters like request ID, device EUI64, endpoint ID, cluster ID, manufacturing specific flag, and configs.

methods.name: executeDeviceRequest
methods.description: Executes the request to set reporting configurations on a given mock Zigbee device, applying configs to the specified cluster.
